waypoints.onload:
changeProfileOption ('WAYPOINT_DEVIATION', 0); changeProfileOption ('MAX_TARGET_DIST', 100); __WPL:setForcedWaypointType ("TRAVEL");
bigMobID = 106355 smallMobID = 106359 centerWP = CWaypoint (-1505, -715) stepWP = 16 calcWP = {} pi = 3.1315926535
for i=0, 2*pi, 2*pi/stepWP do local dx = math.sin (i) local dz = math.cos (i) table.insert (calcWP, {X = dx, Z = - dz}) end
function getWaypoint (idx, radius) return CWaypoint (centerWP.X + calcWP[idx].X * radius, centerWP.Z + calcWP[idx].Z * radius); end
function getNearestWaypointIndex (radius) local idx = 1 local dist = 9999999 for i=1, #calcWP do local wp = getWaypoint (i, radius); local dP = distance (player.X, player.Z, wp.X, wp.Z); if dP < dist then idx = i dist = dP end end return idx end

repeat repeat if player.HP < 1 or not player.Alive then __WPL:setWaypointIndex (__WPL:findWaypointTag ("Friedhof")) return; end; local wp = getWaypoint (currentWP, currentRadius) player:moveTo (wp); until distance (player.X, player.Z, wp.X, wp.Z) < 10 message ('waypoint:'..currentWP..' - radius:'..currentRadius)
if not player.Battling and currentWP == stepWP/2 then message ('pull manually') player:sleep () end
local bigMob = player:findNearestNameOrId (bigMobID); local smallMob = player:findNearestNameOrId (smallMobID); local dist = 0
if bigMob then dist = distance (player.X, player.Z, bigMob.X, bigMob.Z); end if smallMob then dist = distance (player.X, player.Z, smallMob.X, smallMob.Z); end
if dist>170 then currentRadius = currentRadius + ((currentRadius<260 and 10) or 0) elseif dist>0 and dist<130 then currentRadius = currentRadius - ((currentRadius>120 and 10) or 0) end
